name: Nelson's Escape
description:
i reckon... nelson's escape is the best gameever. there is no game like; nelsons esacpe, there never wil be anotherlike nelsonc escape, you WILL all feel these when you play:

-crying

-laugh (lots of comedy's in this one)

-anger (bigshocks make you very angry)

-lets justplay and have fun!

(this is in beta so it will likely have bugs often bear with it)
